00013 namespace {
00014   
00015   char const mem_sizes[] = {' ', 'k', 'M', 'G', 'T', '\0'};
00016   
00017   std::ostream &mem_print(std::ostream &out, long val, char unit='b') {
00018     char const *iter = mem_sizes;
00019 
00020     while( iter[1] && (val>>10) ) {
00021       ++iter;
00022       val >>= 10;
00023     }
00024     out<<val;
00025     if( *iter!=' ' )
00026       out.put(*iter);
00027     return out.put(unit);
00028   }
00029   
00030 } // unnamed

00039 RStat::RStat(RStat::who_type who) 
00040   :_kind(who) {
00041   reset();
00042 }

00044 // Modifiers :
00045 
00046 void RStat::reset(RStat::who_type wt) {
00047   if( wt!=unknown )
00048     _kind = wt;
00049   
00050   switch( _kind ) {
00051   case zeroed:
00052   case unknown:
00053     memset(&_snapshot, 0, sizeof(rusage));
00054     break;
00055   default:
00056     if( getrusage(_kind, &_snapshot)<0 )
00057       throw ErrnoExcept("RStat");
00058   }
00059 }
00060

00181 // Observers :
00182 
00183 std::ostream &RStat::long_desc(std::ostream &out) const {
00184   out<<"Resource Stats ("<<_kind<<"):\n"
00185     "\t- user time        : "<<_snapshot.ru_utime<<" s\n"
00186     "\t- system time      : "<<_snapshot.ru_stime<<" s\n"
00187     "\t- Max resident set : ";
00188   mem_print(out, _snapshot.ru_maxrss)<<"\n"
00189     "\t- Shared text mem  : ";
00190   mem_print(out, _snapshot.ru_ixrss)<<"\n"
00191     "\t- Unshared data    : ";
00192   mem_print(out, _snapshot.ru_idrss)<<"\n"
00193     "\t- Unshared stack   : ";
00194   mem_print(out, _snapshot.ru_isrss)<<"\n"
00195     "\t- Page reclaims    : "<<_snapshot.ru_minflt<<"\n"
00196     "\t- Page Faults      : "<<_snapshot.ru_majflt<<"\n"
00197     "\t- Swaps            : "<<_snapshot.ru_nswap<<"\n"
00198     "\t- Block inputs     : "<<_snapshot.ru_inblock<<"\n"
00199     "\t- Block outputs    : "<<_snapshot.ru_oublock<<"\n"
00200     "\t- Messages sent    : "<<_snapshot.ru_msgsnd<<"\n"
00201     "\t- Messages recvd   : "<<_snapshot.ru_msgrcv<<"\n"
00202     "\t- Signals received : "<<_snapshot.ru_nsignals<<"\n"
00203     "\t- Voluntary ctxt switches : "<<_snapshot.ru_nvcsw<<"\n"
00204     "\t- Unvol. context switches : "<<_snapshot.ru_nivcsw<<std::endl;
00205   return out;
00206 }
00207 
00208 std::string RStat::compact_header() {
00209   return "UserTime\tSystemTime\tMaxRSS\tSharedTxtMem\t"
00210     "UnsharedData\tUnsharedStack\tPageReclaim\tPageFaults";
00211 }
00212 
00213 
00214 std::ostream &RStat::compact_desc(std::ostream &out) const {
00215   out<<_snapshot.ru_utime<<"\t"<<_snapshot.ru_stime<<"\t"
00216      << _snapshot.ru_maxrss<<"\t"<<_snapshot.ru_ixrss<<"\t"
00217      << _snapshot.ru_idrss<<"\t"<<_snapshot.ru_isrss<<"\t"
00218      <<_snapshot.ru_minflt<<"\t"<<_snapshot.ru_majflt;
00219   return out;
00220 }
